extendedInfo.description: Moody Radio has gone mobile! Now you can take Moody Radio with you wherever you go on your Android device.Listen to Moody Radio to get the latest news, weather and programming from your local station. You can also listen live or on-demand to the Moody Radio programs you don't want to miss like In the Market with Janet Parshall, Midday Connection, Chris Fabry Live! and Moody Presents without downloading or syncing. Travelling out of state? Find a full list of Moody Radio stations and tune into what's going on locally. You can also view a full weekly program schedule to see when your favorite program will air on any Moody Radio station around the country.Looking for an uplifting soundtrack or an encouraging message to fuel your day? Stream any of Moody Radio's Internet stations including The Praise & Worship Channel, Majesty Radio, Urban Praise and Proclaim.Just finished listening to an amazing program and want to share it with your friends? Share the program description and a link to listen through e-mail with anyone in your address book.Features:- Listen live to any of Moody Radioâs 36 radio stations, as well as several Internet stations.- Stream recent episodes from your favorite programs on-demand without downloading or syncing.- View a full weekly program schedule, so you never miss the programming you love!- Share a brief description and listen link to the programs youâre listening to with anyone through e-mail.

reviews.title: Love the programs, but doesn\'t play on this app
reviews.comment: For some reason I can never get any of the programs I would like to hear to play through the app. I can stream the live feed, but can\'t play archived programs. Installed on Galaxy s3.
reviews.author: Amanda Johnson

reviews.title: Greatest thing ever, when it works....
reviews.comment: I was so happy that this app came out but it dorsnt play the programs I select and is very slow to play the normal station. Now recently, it stopped completely! Tell the evil one to go away, we won\'t stop praising!
reviews.author: Laura VanTholen

reviews.title: Needs some work
reviews.comment: I am not a tekkie so I have no idea what the problem might be. But I listen to Moody radio as often as I can. When an app for the Android was released I was excited! So often I\'d be listening to a program on the radio and I\'d arrive at my destination and not be able to hear the end. I immediately loaded the app after I found that it was available. I listen to Moody while walking and while cutting the grass. But lately It has been so sporadic. It keeps cutting out and I miss much of the program I am listening to. This happens no matter what the signal strength 2 or 4 bars and even though I have 4G. I have the Motorola Atrix HD 4G which was a new model when I bought it less then a year ago.
reviews.author: Skip Tribby

reviews.title: Big fan of Moody radio but not the app
reviews.comment: I love Moody radio and all of their programming but for some reason this app will not play on my Galaxy 4.  Please can someone look into this.
reviews.author: Catsha Reed

reviews.title: The one thing that can get you through the day
reviews.comment: May the Lord Yahweh pour out his unfailing Grace and favor upon  The Moody Radio Team
reviews.author: Jean-Claude Gahima

reviews.title: Programs never connect
reviews.comment: I can\'t seem to ever get a program to actually play
reviews.author: Michael Drewry

reviews.title: A blessing to me
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: phillip shepheard

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Streams won\'t load on my rooted HTC EVO 4G. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling. Still nothing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Blessing
reviews.comment: This ministry has been a certain Blessing to over the past 55 years. As an alumnus of Moody, I recommend that you get this app on your Smartphone...Ist John 5:11-12;Isaiah 40:31
reviews.author: Gordon E. CARPENTER

reviews.title: LOVE THIS APP!!!
reviews.comment: I\'ve always loved and preferred traditional hymns, spirituals, and chants. Majesty Radio and Sound of Majesty are the best!
reviews.author: Jul ofDenial

reviews.title: Perfect for Hungry Xtians
reviews.comment: Being on a steady diet of Gods Word and Gods LOVE will make you the healthiest human around. I\'m starting from the inside OUT. (1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love It But Like the Apple Version Better
reviews.comment: I really enjoy using this app while using my Ipad and android phone but there is a difference. Apple devices seem to get an updated version ie 1.6.1 while android is still on 1.1. Great Job Moody Radio, just try to update android as well so we can enjoy all of the content that you provide. God Bless ;-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I just started to here your radio moody.I love it all i ask u were have u been ill my life like god said here Thxs moody love u Gloria lopez.... from Chicago

reviews.title: 5 stars when updated.
reviews.comment: I love Moody Radio, but this app keeps freezing and shutting down. Almost like I\'m losing signal, even when I have full service or connected to wifi. Please fix so I can keep listening.
reviews.author: Thomas Wilson

reviews.title: Love it!!!
reviews.comment: I am so happy about this app! The only thing that would make it better is to add some of the weekday afternoon programming like Walk in the Word or the nightly programs like Living on the Edge. But it is really great as it is and such a blessing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it  hate bugs
reviews.comment: I love the app. I use it all the time but sometimes it stops working and I have to uninstall and reinstall. I would rate it 5 stars if it weren\'t for that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: As a great fan of the Proclaim station, I was very glad to find this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Toni28
reviews.comment: My favirite Godly station. Praise God.

reviews.title: Mike Meyer
reviews.comment: This app worked well for about a year. In the last month or so the Praise and Worship has not worked... yet some of the other programs do.  I hope somebody works the bugs out, I enjoy listening to the streaming. I\'m using an android on an LG phone.
reviews.author: Michael Meyer

reviews.title: finally
reviews.comment: thank you for developing this for android. love it! but is there a way to bookmark stations?
